title: My Lunar Revel Skins changed

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: The Graves and Alistar skins changed after i had seen them (pool party Graves, Sweeper Alistar) to Hired Gun and Infernal

replies.body:
Nasus and Alistar at 70% off?

You're lucky. I got Forsaken Olaf as my only 70% off.

I got Sad Robot Amumu and Firefox Ahri for 70% off.

Also got Officer Caitlyn for 60% off. 

Bought Amumu and Caitlyn, but I have popstar ahri which I prefer so I'm skipping firefox I guess even though it's an insane deal (my snowdown shop had 2 ahri skins too, wish Riot would learn I like the one I have :P).

Others I believe were Dino Gnar (50%), Ninja Rammus (20%), and Warring Kingdoms J4 (30%). 

Was pretty happy with this shop compared to the last one :)
I already have Riot K-9 Nasus but im still gonna get it but that alistar skin is a beauty

The skins that are being replaced in your Lunar Revel Shop are scheduled to go on sale either in January or February. We don't want you to get a Lunar Revel sale only to see it in a regular sale over the next few days, so we have replaced those sales in the Lunar Revel Shop with different offers.
Thank you very much for clearing that up :D

I'm leaving this post here for Riot staff as it has to do with this issue and the _**RP Purchase Error**_ that came with it.
___
I had a very similar issue with Jinx just now. I was going to buy Mafia Jinx/Jinx at 70% off only to find it updated with Firecracker Jinx/Jinx. I believe ( but am not sure that ) the resets are intentional. When I tried to buy the updated Jinx set though I found the shop had an error with the Jinx skin and other skins were still able to be purchased. You can read in detail ( steps to recreation, etc. ) about it [here.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/vEFAFVTy-client-lunar-revel-shop-wont-sell-me-the-championskin-i-want-to-buy)

They changed skins that are on sale this month, so you get a chance for different skins

[Post about it.](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/435wvr/psa_all_skins_that_are_scheduled_to_be_on_sale_in/)

And the Riot confirmation: https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/435wvr/psa_all_skins_that_are_scheduled_to_be_on_sale_in/czfqlwj
